alert.note: Alert for Eastern Curry County and Josephine County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 4:59PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Josephine County through 530 PM PDT... At 459 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Merlin, or near Grants Pass, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and up to half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grants Pass, Griffin Park, I 5 Sexton Summit, Hellgate Overlook, Merlin, Whitehorse Park and Indian Mary Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 5 between Grants Pass and Glendale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Curry County and Josephine County
